version_description: Bug fixes and minor enhancements

Thank you for using our app. We have listened to your feedback and our latest update includes the following features and improvements:

• the ability to send a bill payment with a future date
• general navigation improvements
• bug fixes and security improvements

We always listen to your feedback and are working really hard to improve your everyday Mobile banking experience.

Thank you for using the HSBC Canada app. We have listened to your feedback and our latest update includes the following features and improvements:

• The introduction of auto deposit for an incoming INTERAC e-Transfer®
• Improvements to the user experience when setting up a future dated transaction
• The ability to set up a recurring transfer
• Bug fixes

We always listen to your feedback and are working hard to improve your everyday Mobile banking experience.
Bug fixes

Thank you for using the HSBC Canada app.

HSBC Mastercard® product holders will be able to view and download their statements directly to their device.

We always listen to your feedback and are working hard to improve your everyday Mobile banking experience.

• Customers can now view and download their Chequing and Savings account statements directly on their mobile device.
• Bug fixes
